Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Damage reduction rate 30%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (AGL excluded)
to Rainbow Ki Spheres
- Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 70%{passiveImg:up_g} for allies whose names include
"Gohan (Teen)", "Ultimate Gohan" (Majin Buu excluded) or
"Great Saiyaman" (Great Saiyaman other than Gohan excluded)
*When attacking with 12 or more Ki*
- ATK & DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When there is another "Peppy Gals" Category ally attacking in
the same turn, or when there is an ally whose name includes
"Gohan (Teen)", "Ultimate Gohan" (Majin Buu excluded) or
"Great Saiyaman" (Great Saiyaman other than Gohan excluded)
attacking in the same turn*
- Damage reduction rate 50%{passiveImg:up_g} before attacking
- ATK 300%{passiveImg:up_g} when attacking
*For every turn passed*
- {passiveImg:forever}Damage reduction rate 10%{passiveImg:down_r} (no more than -30%)
*For 3 turns from the character's entry turn*
- DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
- High chance of performing a critical hit
- Launches an additional attack that has a high chance of becoming
a Super Attack
*When the character is KO'd starting from the 4th turn from the
character's entry turn*
- {passiveImg:once}Revives with HP fully recovered
*After the character's Revival Skill is activated*
- {passiveImg:forever}ATK & DEF 200%{passiveImg:up_g}
- {passiveImg:forever}Damage reduction rate 30%{passiveImg:up_g}
- {passiveImg:forever}Performs a critical hit
- {passiveImg:forever}Launches an additional Super Attack

7905.superDescription:
Massively raises DEF for 3 turns and 
causes supreme damage to enemy
